title: All of Her Men
description: Jolene enjoys her privacy. She's always been a woman with lots of secrets. That is, until she begins receiving strange letters in the mail. Someone knows her secret and she doesn't like it very much.A story filled with intrigue and oozing with sex. All of Her Men is a story like none other. This book is sure to keep you guessing at what Jolene plans to do next.
author: Lourdes Bernabe
